com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.JDBC

Class LineItemDaoJDBC

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.JDBC.LineItemDaoJDBC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineItemDao

    public class LineItemDaoJDBC
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineItemDao

    This class is supposed to handle the line items in the database. We implemented the add, find by id, change quantity, set quantity, remove, get all by order id and get all line items query.
